page.title: 13My Home
page.content: My name is Melanie and I am eleven years old. I live in{Longfellow Road} in Caldicot with my parents, sister and brother. We have four bedrooms, one kitchen, a dining room and a living room. Downstairs we also have a bathroom and toilet. Our house is heated by Gas and my mother uses a Gas cooker for cooking. As well as having a radiator in every room we also have a gas fire in the living room. There are two sliding glass doors between the living room and the dining room so that we can have two separate rooms or one long one. We have a large garden at the back of our house. My father takes care of this but he has given my sister and me a small plot for us to grow flowers in.
